Text:
function RIR_EP04_17()
    -- .転-2【12月第3週】「ビバ雑草魂」
    SaveData.Title = "ビバ雑草魂"

    -- //CG：武術の修行（構え・傷だらけ）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV022ab")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav")

    MSG([[ The last weekend before the Princess Election. The final training session with the Aikido instructor. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira uncovered the secret to the strength of the bodyguard techniques that Daria uses. ]])

    MSG([[ "Seeing ahead of what’s next" by reading the opponent's gaze and hands. That skill, considered especially advanced in martial arts, left ordinary me with only one way to counter it. ]])

    -- //CG：武術の修行（投げ）
    --LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV022ad")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"EV022bb")
    LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,110,110)
    LAYER_POSITION(LAYER_BG,1100,-450)
    LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(LAYER_BG,200,200,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(LAYER_BG,2000,-800,1000,Ease.OutCubic)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BG000aa")
    LAYER_ALPHA(60,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(60,255,1000,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask025",500,false)
    WAIT(500)

    MSG([[ The moment I grabbed my opponent, I close my eyes. Then I just let my body, ingrained with throwing motions, act on autopilot and throw unconsciously. ]])

    MSG([[ It’s pointless for the opponent to try to read my movements. Since it’s unconscious, even I don’t know which throw my body will execute―― ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV022ad")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask032",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1477.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Se-yaaah!!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aikidoist_0009.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aikido Instructor】
 "Wha――" ]])

    -- //SE：畳に叩きつけられる音（ﾀﾞｧﾝｯ！）
PLAY_SE("SEc021.wav")
WAIT(400)

    MSG([[ Completely taken by surprise, the instructor’s body was slammed onto the tatami. ]])

    MSG([[ For the first time, I successfully executed a throwing technique on the instructor. At that moment, everyone watching cheered all at once. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0888.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "You did it!!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0430.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "That was a perfect ippon!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0384.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】
 "Erika-nee-sama is seriously amazing!" ]])

    MSG([[ It was borderline cheating. In a certain way, it was a strategy that abandoned technique, and it pained me. ]])

    MSG([[ But the instructor smiled contentedly lying on his back on the floor and applauded me. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aikidoist_0010.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aikido Instructor】
 "That was a wonderful throw. To think you'd counter Aiki techniques with such a strategy... I was completely outplayed." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("aikidoist_0011.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Aikido Instructor】
 "I retract my comment about you having no sense. You possess marvelous fighting sense." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1478.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "No, it’s true that I do lack sense." ]])

    MSG([[ Yes, the reason I was able to throw the instructor so cleanly today was not by my power alone. ]])

    MSG([[ My dependable partner researched the information and pondered it with me. ]])

    MSG([[ I, who can only come up with ordinary strategies, could never have thought of such a trick. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1479.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I will prove with this technique that even an ordinary person with no sense can beat a genius through effort." ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：メインストリート（夕方・冬）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG019bc")
    -- //BU：リラ（ウインク）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0889.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Good work, Erika—let’s walk home together." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1480.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes, of course." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ On the way home after defeating the Aikido instructor. ]])

    MSG([[ I happened to run into Lira on the main street, and we ended up walking home side by side. ]])

    MSG([[ Among the group I usually hang out with, only Lira and I are not part of any club activities. ]])

    MSG([[ Because of that, it’s not uncommon for us two to ride the bus home together. ]])

    MSG([[ However, Lira seemed different that day. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07hb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0890.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Um, hey... before we go home today, can you come with me for a bit?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1481.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Huh?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ …. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017",1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //BG：グラウンド（夜）
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG012ba")
    -- //BU：リラ（真剣）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR07ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask017" , 1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1482.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If someone grabs your collar, first press the base of their thumb on the hand grabbing you, and twist it around." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0891.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "L-like this?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1483.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes, exactly like that. Your opponent’s fingers will lose strength, so you can easily peel off their hand." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1484.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Then, while stepping back, push the grabbed hand like you’re making the opponent bow. That will definitely make them lose balance." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0892.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Like this, maybe?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1485.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ouch! Yes, very good. It doesn’t seem like you’re doing this for the first time! With that form, your opponent will definitely lose their balance!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR07fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0893.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hey, you’re smiling though." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1486.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Pain means success. This is one of the basics of arrest techniques called '<r=オジギソウ>Mimosa</r>', a convenient move requiring neither strength nor technique." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0894.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Yeah, honestly, I wonder if it’s really okay to be this simple. I’m bad at punching and kicking, so I was worried, you know." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1487.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes. I think very few people can hit or kick on the spot, so I chose techniques that anyone can easily do first." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1488.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "But I was surprised. I didn’t expect Lira to be interested in arrest techniques." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I was surprised when Lira, who happened to be walking with me home, asked me to teach her arrest techniques. ]])

    MSG([[ She said she wanted to talk at the usual hamburger place, but martial arts are best learned through practice. ]])

    MSG([[ So we came to the ground, and while having me apply techniques to her, she learned the basics. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR07ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0895.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ah, well... seeing Erika in today’s practice piqued my interest. Sorry for bothering you after training." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0896.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I looked online and read that arrest techniques are easy for beginners to learn, so I thought I want to learn them too." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1489.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Yes. That’s why arrest techniques are taught at the police academy. The Ikusa style is a more common and practical adaptation." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1490.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Each technique is named after a plant with similar characteristics, which makes them easier to remember. My uncle named them because named moves are easier to recall, like special moves." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR07fa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0897.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I thought the names had a strangely anime vibe. So that’s why. Your uncle definitely likes anime." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0898.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Hey, teach me that move. The one you showed me when we first met." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1491.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Huh? Did I demonstrate arrest techniques when we first met? I was so overwhelmed by seeing you appear in the school cafeteria, I don’t think I did anything." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0899.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Huh? You know, the ones with the flashy guys that hit on us in town――" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BUL_RIR07ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0900.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Ah." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1492.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "That’s the story of Riko and Minato, right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //CI：お互い正体を隠して焦るエリリラ・継続 128
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"CI128a")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0901.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Y-yeah, right! S-sorry! Riko keeps bugging me about it! I feel like it happened to me myself!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1493.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Haha, that happens when family goes to the same school. It’s common." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0902.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Y-yeah..." ]])

    MSG([[ Rarely flustered, Lira was. ]])

    MSG([[ To think she mixed up family stories with herself. I found it endearing that even Lira can make careless mistakes like me. ]])

    MSG([[ Well, in my case, Erika and I are the same person, so that’s troublesome... ]])

    -- //CI：お互い正体を隠して焦るエリリラ・終了 128
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
    LAYER_MOVE_ALPHA(50,0,500,Ease.InSine)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,200,500,Ease.InSine)
    WAIT(500)
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1494.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If Minato used it, it was probably ‘Asagao’ (Morning Glory). It’s a technique that ties up the opponent with familiar objects." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1495.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Both Minato and I aren’t good at punching or kicking, so we specialize in techniques to subdue opponents without injury." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0903.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "That’s good. As long as I can protect myself, that’s enough for me." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0904.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "But isn’t tying someone up with familiar things kinda tough? How do you do it, Erika?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1496.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "It’s all about getting used to it. You have to practice. When I’m in casual clothes, I use a belt or my jacket." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0905.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "A jacket, huh... I’d feel weird about that. I wouldn’t want my favorite top to get stretched out." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1497.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Often the belts or jackets used can’t be retrieved afterward. Honestly, I don’t recommend it much. Besides, you’re attacking your opponent yourself." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1498.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Many self-defense courses assume you’ll knock your opponent down with foot sweeps and such, but for beginners, the best is to escape as soon as their hand is free." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1499.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If you attack first, the risk of counterattack increases." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0906.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Got it, I’ll keep that in mind." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0907.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "But still, it’s cool, and you’ve gotta teach me ‘Asagao’! I wanna learn at least one move that feels like a finishing move!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1500.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Geez... please make sure to run away properly if it gets really dangerous, okay?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0908.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Roger that! I got it got it~<sprite="Emoji" name="note">" ]])

    MSG([[ I was a little worried, but happier that Lira took an interest in arrest techniques. ]])

    MSG([[ In the end, I decided to teach her the basics of 'Asagao.' ]])

    MSG([[ Though chances to use arrest techniques are rare unless something serious happens. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1501.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Listen carefully. The parts to bind with ‘Asagao’ are the wrists or ankles. It’s best if you can bind both, but prioritize binding the hands." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0909.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Huh? Wouldn’t the legs be better? If you can’t move your legs, you can beat them up, and if their legs are free, they might escape." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1502.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If they do escape, that’s fine. The goal isn’t to knock them down." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1503.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "If their hands are free, they might undo the restraint. If their hands are bound, they can’t keep balance and will fall. It’s all benefits." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0910.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "I see! As expected of Erika! You’d make a great teacher!" ]])

    MSG([[ In the end, the boys’ club was off that day, so I stayed with Lira through her training. Thanks to that, I relearned the basics of arrest techniques myself. It was a good break. ]])

    MSG([[ However, the words Lira said at the end of training stuck in my ears. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ia")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0911.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "Thanks, Erika. Now I can properly protect myself." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1504.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "P-protect...? Lira, are you being targeted by someone?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_0912.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】
 "You’ll understand eventually, so don’t worry about it." ]])

    MSG([[ Lira said that, but I couldn’t not worry. ]])

    MSG([[ With a vague unsettled feeling, the day of the Princess Election finally arrived. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000", 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RIR_EP04_18")
end
